document_data.name: Iados
document_data.mainbody: '''Iados''' was a [[tiefling]] warrior and a companion of the [[dragonborn]] [[paladin]] [[Thava]]. He was an old friend of the [[monk]] [[Kwan Shang-Li]] and joined forces with him to defeat [[Caelynna]] and recover several rare tomes belonging to the [[Standing Tree Monastery]].
document_data.Appearance: Iados had dark red skin, large horns that he could use as a weapon, and a tail. He had shoulder length hair.
